Introduction

LIGHTSUM is a six-member girl group under Cube Entertainment. They made their debut on June 10, 2021, with the single "Vanilla".

On Oct 25, 2022, Cube Entertainment released a statement announcing the departure of Huiyeon, and Jian, and affirmed their plans for LIGHTSUM to continue as a six-member group.

Their group name "LIGHTSUM" means that bright LIGHTs will come together as one SUM to reach everyone worldwide, becoming a group that will put positive energy into everyone through their hopeful message.
